photos.title: Blossom inspired interiors
photos.text: The Blossom Design Series Stand Mixer blurs the line between appliance and art with its soft thyme green color, botanical details, and unique hammered copper bowl. Explore ways to see it in your kitchen.

photos.title: Grow with attachments
photos.text: Explore your full potential. With over 10 different attachments to enjoy, you can make everything from fresh pasta to burgers, veggie noodles, ice cream and more.

slides.text: Discover fresh recipe inspiration for every meal, every occasion, every craving.

recipesList.title: Epi bread
recipesList.text: Master the basics, and then branch out with this French-inspired epi-bread.

recipesList.title: Flower and herb butter
recipesList.text: Whip up butter in full bloom.

recipesList.title: Rose-shaped gyoza dumplings
recipesList.text: Dumplings for dinner? Create them as a bouquet of Rose-Shaped Gyoza.
